mapper.insert: insert into coinfotb (cuserid, csrno, cusnm, bossnm, loc01, loc02, indue, deptno, emnum, binfo, adate) values (#{cuserid} ,#{csrno}, #{cusnm}, #{bossnm}, #{loc01}, #{loc02}, #{indue}, #{deptno} , #{emnum}, #{binfo}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE coinfotb SET csrno = #{csrno}, cusnm = #{cusnm}, bossnm = #{bossnm}, loc01 = #{loc01}, loc02 = #{loc02}, indue = #{indue}, deptno = #{deptno}, emnum = #{emnum}, binfo = #{binfo}, adate = NOW() WHERE cuserid = #{cuserid}
mapper.select: select cuserid, csrno, cusnm, bossnm, loc01, loc02, deptno, deptnm, emnum, imgno, usetb, gubun, uuid, uploadpath, filename from ( select a.cuserid, a.csrno, a.cusnm, a.bossnm, a.loc01, a.loc02, a.deptno, b.deptnm, a.emnum, c.imgno, c.usetb, c.gubun, c.uuid, c.uploadpath, c.filename from coinfotb a inner join sectortb b on (a.deptno = b.deptno) left outer join imgtb c on (c.usetb = 'coinfotb' and c.gubun = concat(a.cuserid, '_', a.csrno)) ) as a where cuserid = #{cuserid} and csrno = #{csrno};
